title: I’m a IB student. When applying for universities, do they consider my performance in MYP? Or, do they only look at my DP? - Quora

response.answer_text: Standard university application procedure requires you to submit your myp transcript as it counts as a qualification. However, in the grand scheme of things, it doesn't really matter in comparison to your academics, your application statement and your extra curriculars.
They’ll want your transcript from MYP. And the final results from MYP.
